TopicTitle: FSbattery Part missing after updating mods

Articles.Content:
I recently updated a few of my mods to 1.04 versions and after loading up my save file I get the message that certain spacecraft couldn't be loaded because the FSbattery part could not be found. This part is a fuel tank sized battery that wasd included in a mod but I have no idea which one. I used this battery in Power station ships and attached it to all my space stations so now all my space stations have been removed from the game ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). I can't seem to find which mod this part was from so I don't know how to get the part back in the game.

Any help is very much appreciated,

Shaun
It was included in Firespitter for your information.

> 
> It was included in Firespitter for your information.

You my friend are an absolute life saver. I've re-installed firespitter and all my spacecraft are back.

Thank you very much for your help.

Shaun
